https://tmrev.io/movie/782546-Ecki´s World 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/du5dP7nyt7Q9InzVc1j9efbgE0I.jpg The documentary is a portrait of of the oldest video library in the world and his owner. Eckhard "Ecki" Baum opened the „Video Film-Shop“ in Kassel (Germany) in the summer of 1975. It all began in „Wolfsanger“ with the sale and exchange of Super8 films, that soon lured to a bigger shop and some daring methods. Ecki´s World
